title: UPDATE: Teenager killed in shooting near Wells Park in Rockford
content:
ROCKFORD (WREX) -
The Winnebago County Coroner's Office says the 14-year-old boy killed was Jamario Crawford of Rockford. Crawford was pronounced dead a little after 9:30 p.m. Friday at the 900 block of North Rockton Ave., according to the coroner's office.
The death is under investigation by the Rockford Police Department.
---
A 14-year-old boy is dead, and a 17-year-old is in the hospital, after a shooting in the area of North Rockton Ave. and Bruce St. on Friday evening.
Rockford Police believe the victims were walking in the 900 block of North Rockton Ave. around 7:00 p.m. when they confronted by the suspect, described as a boy in his teens. Police say the suspect fired several shots in the direction of the victims and left on foot.
The 14-year-old was killed and the 17-year-old boy suffered a gunshot wound the shoulder. The 17-year-old suffered serious but non-life threatening injuries.
The names of the victims are not being released at this time.
Anyone with information is asked to call Rockford Police at 779-500-655 or Crime Stoppers at 815-963-7867.
13 News will update this story as more information becomes available.
---
No further information is available at this time. Additional details will be released when they become available.
